cause.description:
We don't require money/donation. We only require people to join us and make the word loud! Join our group "World Peace" and invite your friends. All members are worth more then donations cause we cant prize humans. Write your country on the wall. First mission is to have at least one member from every country in the world.
Visit and join the group World Peace :
http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2387229819
Invite your friends!
1. One member from each continent -> DONE
2. One member from each country -> Pending
3. At least, but not last: World Peace -> Pending
cause.name: World Peace
